title: Stage Lv6-P6-S33
description: Level 6 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Never have I seen such dedication.
Only then did I realize my mistake.
learning_points: Level 6 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: Never have I seen such dedication.
Only then did I realize my mistake.

sentences.kr: 우리는 무슨 일이 일어날지 전혀 몰랐습니다.
sentences.en: Little did we know what was coming.
Rarely does such an opportunity come along.
Only when we are fully prepared will we begin.

sentences.kr: 결코 그런 실수를 다시 하지 않을 것입니다.
sentences.en: Never again will we make such a mistake.

sentences.kr: 우리는 그 소식을 듣고 전혀 놀라지 않았습니다.
sentences.en: Little were we surprised by that news.

sentences.kr: 모든 조건이 충족될 때만 계약을 체결하겠습니다.
sentences.en: Only when all conditions are met will we sign the contract.
